unnormalised: Home Loan Schemes Getting a Facelift, Paisa Bachao Folks!
normalised: Home Loan Schemes Getting a Facelift, Paisa Bachao Folks!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra, or maybe a cozy little bungalow in Goa? Good news! Home loan schemes are getting a serious makeover. Banks like HDFC and ICICI are rolling out fresh offers, hoping to lure in the Diwali crowd.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra, or maybe a cozy little bungalow in Goa? Good news! Home loan schemes are getting a serious makeover. Banks like H D F C and I C I C I are rolling out fresh offers, hoping to lure in the Diwali crowd.

unnormalised: Word on the street (read: financial analyst reports) is that interest rates might be tweaked yet again before 31/12/2023. So, keep an eye out! Plus, there's talk of easier eligibility criteria for first-time buyers, especially for those planning to build in tier-2 cities like Lucknow.
normalised: Word on the street (read: financial analyst reports) is that interest rates might be tweaked yet again before thirty first December two thousand and twenty three. So, keep an eye out! Plus, there's talk of easier eligibility criteria for first-time buyers, especially for those planning to build in tier-two cities like Lucknow.

unnormalised: Remember Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana? Still a great option! Check if you qualify. Also, some developers are partnering with lenders to offer sweet deals on under-construction properties. Sneaky tip: Negotiate hard – especially if you're booking around 11:00 AM on 15/08/2023 when everyone's distracted with flag hoisting! You might just snag a discount.
normalised: Remember Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana? Still a great option! Check if you qualify. Also, some developers are partnering with lenders to offer sweet deals on under-construction properties. Sneaky tip: Negotiate hard – especially if you're booking around eleven A M on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty three when everyone's distracted with flag hoisting! You might just snag a discount.

unnormalised: Don't be a bakra! Do your research before jumping in. Compare those EMI calculators and read the fine print. Happy house hunting, folks! Let's make that Griha Pravesh memorable! And remember, stamp duty registration is mandatory before 05/11/2023!
normalised: Don't be a bakra! Do your research before jumping in. Compare those E M I calculators and read the fine print. Happy house hunting, folks! Let's make that Griha Pravesh memorable! And remember, stamp duty registration is mandatory before fifth November two thousand and twenty three!
